name: 📺 You Call The Shots!
description:
🖱Please click to engage sound 🔊

The world’s first Cine ‘Em Up?

⏰ 10sec Slices Of Stardom
💥 Fast fingers and rhythmic surprises
✌️Two game modes
✨Can you get an S rank?

Made for Ludum Dare 51 in 72 hours Theme: "Every 10 Seconds"

🔧 Programmed by Ollie Powell
🎨 Art by Adam Butcher
📣 SFX by Tom Carrell
🎥 Movies by Your Favourite “Fair Use” Directors 😉
📺 Designed by Ollie Powell, Adam Butcher, Tom Carrell and Ezgi Hazal Aygan
